name: aubergine
title: Aubergine
desc: A bold dark-mode theme for modern agencies.
article:
Aubergine is a sleek, confident template made for creative studios and service teams that want to stand out with style and precision.

All Pages

  • Sign up


(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Blog Tags
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
